author: .paulharris
content:
raised a ticket to get discussion happening over id validation on `beacon/states/{state_id}/validators` as we've had an issue raised against teku about it... https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/issues/183
Now that I've addressed the error response in the teku ticket, I think the behaviour of teku is consistent with what's documented, but it sounds like we're not consistent across clients, so it's probably worth having the discussions to see if we are content with the state of play of that endpoint.
